name: Window Hero Charleston
address: 222 W Coleman Blvd #21, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464, USA

reviews.author: Muriel Sanders
reviews.text:
Excellent work. From front porch to back porch all looks great.
The two technicians that came were both very pleasant
It really was a pleasure working with this company! I would highly recommend. The office staff was exceptional. Exceeded all my expectations

reviews.author: Richard McEntee
reviews.text: Did a great job cleaning debris causing leaks around skylights. Jonah was quick on the metal roof and took photos to show work done. Have used Window Hero Charleston to clean gutters and wash roof and will see them regularly from now on.

reviews.author: Tracie Gunnell
reviews.text: Shane and Mo were AWESOME GUYâ€™S!  They did everything they said they were gonna do on the job!   They moved my grandchildrenâ€™s toys inside and out of needed to be removed out of their way.  I really appreciate a good company like this one.  I called them one day and they came out the next day.  I canâ€™t say it enough!  They were great!  Also they canâ€™t leave Nate out either! ðŸ˜†  He was a pleasure to speak with setting everything up for the cleaning job.

reviews.author: Katherine Pringle
reviews.text: What an AMAZING experience we had  with the two guys from Window Heroes! They truly ARE. They were incredibly thorough, careful and professional. My job entailed removing all the old storm windows, cleaning the house windows and glass doors inside and outside, pressure washing my house and all of the concrete. I totally recommend this company!

reviews.author: Kyle Hayslett
reviews.text: I am beyond satisfied with Window Hero and the services they did for my home. They contacted me for a courtesy reminder before hand, showed up on time as scheduled, and did an excellent job on the house. One other positive that I want to mention is that I didnâ€™t need to be home for their team to come out. I was able to schedule my appointment and go to work, then come home and see the results. I am very happy with the work they did and i will use then again. Thank you!
